feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Interconnect
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Interconnect

entry.content:
Interconnect connection groups and VLAN attachment groups are [Generally available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages). You can use resource groups to communicate your intended level of reliability, and to receive feedback on how your Cloud Interconnect resources meet that intended level of reliability.
For more information, see [Resiliency and SLA options](https://cloud.google.com/network-connectivity/docs/interconnect/concepts/overview#sla-options).
entry.summary: Interconnect connection groups and VLAN attachment groups are now generally available. You can utilize resource groups to communicate your reliability intentions and receive feedback on how your Cloud Interconnect resources align with them.
entry.title: Feature: Interconnect connection groups and VLAN attachment groups are now generally available.

entry.content:
Cross-Site Interconnect ([Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages)) support is available in the following colocation facilities:
* Melbourne, Australia
For more information, see the [Locations table](https://cloud.google.com/network-connectivity/docs/interconnect/concepts/cross-site-locations#locations-table) and [Global Locations](https://cloud.google.com/about/locations).
entry.summary: Cross-Site Interconnect is now available in Melbourne, Australia. For more details, check the locations table and global locations.
entry.title: Feature: Cross-Site Interconnect support in Melbourne
